attributes.review: This app took 420 minutes to download which is way too long for an app to take the download. I want to download it and I open the app all the important information on my phone was deleted and was sent directly to the president. I really want to support my one and only president Mr. orange chito dust Donald Trump. I love this man with all my heart but this app just destroyed my phone and office I had in him. For my fellow trump supporters avoid this app. It's not good for your phone but you can still support your president even without downloading to stupid app.
